item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I build a program now and i need little help (If you can even do it on java) i need help before you do something unable all the screen (files, internets)
example:
before i do the password unable all the files.

And i need help with other program:

	public void eatSomething(int howMuchHealthToAdd, String itemName){
		cHP += howMuchHealthToAdd;
		repaint();
		sMessage("You start to eat "+itemName);
	}
	class Action1 implements ActionListener {
		
		public void actionPerformed (ActionEvent e){
			eatSomething(17,"Pizza");
		}
	}

and in this is the button:
JButton button = new JButton();

button.addActionListener(new Action1());

And its dosent repaint the JFrame ( i want it to update the health)

Read full topic
